meanings.definition: A group of compounds derived from vitamin A that are used in skincare products for their anti-aging properties.
meanings.sent1: Retinoids can help reduce wrinkles and improve skin texture.
meanings.sent2: I use retinoids in my night cream to keep my skin looking youthful.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that retinoids are like magic potions for your face.
meanings.sent4: To me, retinoids are like little soldiers fighting against the signs of aging.
meanings.sent5: The power of retinoids in skincare is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: Any of various synthetic or naturally occurring analogs of vitamin A used in the treatment of skin conditions.
meanings.sent1: Doctors often prescribe retinoids to treat acne and other skin issues.
meanings.sent2: My dermatologist recommended using retinoids to improve my skin's condition.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd be so grateful for retinoids in my skincare routine.
meanings.sent4: Using retinoids feels like giving my skin a much-needed boost of vitamins.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of retinoids in treating skin problems is impressive.
